Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:4 minutes, 35 seconds  On December 17th De Soto National Memorial held its third annual Winter Luminary walk. We were happy to have Juan Leon, a Native American who plays and designs his own flutes. Juan's melodies were the highlight of the evening drawing large crowds. He is just a sample of one of his performances.
